name: Movies with "Hot" in the Title! Online Trivia | Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: Topper Harley was reinstated for service on the SS Essess to destroy nuclear plants that had been set up by Saddam Hussein.  Can you name this 1991 comedy?
questions.explanation:
Hot Shots.

	Jim Abrams directed this movie, which spoofed everything from "Top Gun" to "Gone With the Wind".  Charlie Sheen, Lloyd Bridges, Cary Elwes, and Valeria Golino starred in this box-office hit that grossed over $69,000,000 in the United States.  There was a moderately successful sequel that followed this, in 1993, called "Hot Shots: Part Deux".

questions.text: A loner came to a small town in the South to set up a new life as a used car salesman.  He became involved with his boss' demanding wife and he felt his only way out of the situation was to rob the local bank.  Can you name this movie that Dennis Hopper directed in 1990?
questions.explanation:
The Hot Spot.

	This sultry drama starred Don Johnson, Virginia Madsen, and Jennifer Connelly.  Elisabeth Shue was originally sought for the role of Gloria Harper, which ended up going to Connelly.

questions.text: A gang of nerds spent their summer at the beach, scoping out hot chicks, hoping to get lucky.  Can you name this 80's teen sex comedy?
questions.explanation:
Hot Moves.

	This low budget romp starred Michael Zorek, Jill Schoelen, and Monique Gabrielle.  Monique Gabrielle can also been seen as Tracy in "Bachelor Party".

questions.text: Two unsuccessful musicians stumble onto a murder scene and end up on the run from the mob.  The only way for them to get out of the city was to pose as women in an all girl band.  What 1950's comedy am I referring to?
options: Cat on a Hot Tin Roof
questions.explanation:
Some Like it Hot.

	This 1959 comedy saw its problems from the get go.  The director, Billy Wilder, became so fed up with Marilyn Monroe's mistakes that several of her lines were dubbed over.  Tony Curtis also reported that kissing Monroe was "like kissing Hitler".

questions.text: A gorgeous teenage girl woke up in the body of the luckiest dork in the world.  Throughout her journey in this 30-year old man's body she learned what a shallow person she had become.
questions.explanation:
The Hot Chick.

	Rob Schneider and Rachel McAdams starred as the lead characters in this gender bending comedy.  "The Hot Chick" made over $35,000,000 dollars at the box office in the United States.  This film was also credited as Ashlee Simpson's first film role.

questions.text: This camp comedy took place at Camp Firewood in 1981.  The group of teens became involved in all kinds of hilarious mishaps that included preventing a piece of the NASA Skylab from crashing into the camp.  David Hyde Pierce and Janeane Garofalo starred in this comedy.
questions.explanation:
Wet Hot American Summer.

	This satirical and slapstick comedy was released in 2001.  The basis of the camp was modeled after a camp that the director, David Wain, attended in Maine as a child.

questions.text: Ben Quick drifted into a small Mississippi town and took up with the Varner family.  The patriarch of the Varner family decided that Ben would make an excellent choice for a husband to his timid school teacher daughter, Clara.  Can you name this drama?
options: Cat on a Hot Tin Roof
questions.explanation:
The Long, Hot Summer.

	"The Long, Hot Summer, was the first film that starred Paul Newman and Joanne Woodward.  An interesting trivia bit about the film is that Orson Wells wore a fake nose during the production.  He sweat so much during filming that makeup had to constantly be reapplied to keep the nose from falling off of his face.

questions.text: A young man inherited a talking horse that helped him strike it rich in the stock market.  Can you name this Bobcat Goldthwait comedy?
questions.explanation:
Hot to Trot.

	This crazy comedy starred Dabney Coleman, Virginia Madsen, and John Candy, as Don, the talking horse.  Tim Burton was originally asked to direct this feature film but turned it down.

questions.text: A group of young naive skiers headed to Colorado for a big skiing competition and picked up a gorgeous hitchhiker along the way.  What "hot" movie is this?
questions.explanation:
Hot Dog:  The Movie.

	This raunchy sex comedy was released in the United States on January 13, 1984.  It starred David Naughton and Shannon Tweed.  This film had all of the requirements of an 80's sex comedy, wild antics, drugs, and rock 'n roll!

questions.text: Danny Bartlett had the opportunity to go to the Caribbean with his girlfriend's family.  After discovering he must first take a test he decided to join them later on their trip.  He ran into several misadventures while trying to catch up with them.  Can you guess this "hot" movie?
questions.explanation:
Hot Pursuit.

	Steven Lisberger directed this 1987 comedy.  Lisberger is also known for his work as the directed of "Tron".  "Hot Pursuit" was released on May 8, 1987 in the United States and starred John Cusack, Robert Loggia, and Shelley Fabares.  If you watch closely you will notice that this film also had a small part that was played by Ben Stiller.
